thread.title: Vivian
thread.title_full: Traffic School 4 Busy People reviewed by Vivian

author: Vivian
title: Vivian
text: I recommend this site for traffic school. Choose it because of their name and cost. Glad I did. When taking final I recommend you take the time to really read the questions. I answered two questions incorrectly because I didn't read them correctly. Not trick questions just read and answered to fast. Thank you for providing such a good way to complete my traffic school.
